# The `ArgumentReplacementInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper struct used in the communication between an abstract attribute (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>) that wants to change the signature of a function and the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> which applies the changes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Helper struct used in the communication between an abstract attribute (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>) that wants to change the signature of a function and the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> which applies the changes.

The struct is partially initialized with the information from the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> (see the constructor). All other members are provided by the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> prior to invoking any callbacks.

Definition at line 2221 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Typedefs

### ACSRepairCBTy {#ae7e2d390e89b26a2e16db36d9f522874}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::Attributor::ArgumentReplacementInfo::ACSRepairCBTy = 
        std::function&lt;void(const ArgumentReplacementInfo &amp;, AbstractCallSite,
                           SmallVectorImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt; &amp;)&gt;</>}>
Abstract call site (ACS) repair callback type.

The abstract call site repair callback is invoked once on every abstract call site of the replaced function (
<SectionUser title="See Also">
ReplacedFn). The callback needs to provide the operands <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> the call to the new replacement <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/regionprinter-cpp/#aa37fbbce2360106772fd97ed06455d55">function</a>. The number and type of the operands appended to the provided <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpupromotealloca-cpp/#ac760e37eba1d852d0a28011a1a0ce05f">vector</a> (second argument) is defined by the number and types determined through the replacement type <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpupromotealloca-cpp/#ac760e37eba1d852d0a28011a1a0ce05f">vector</a> (
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="See Also">
ReplacementTypes). The first argument is the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor/argumentreplacementinfo">ArgumentReplacementInfo</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/object">object</a> registered with the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> through the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor/#a0121eb7b984a5cf2527133cb838d5982">registerFunctionSignatureRewrite</a> call.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l02242">2242</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### CalleeRepairCBTy {#a2083e74f7ea053500761e58968041ff7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::Attributor::ArgumentReplacementInfo::CalleeRepairCBTy =  std::function&lt;void(
        const ArgumentReplacementInfo &amp;, Function &amp;, Function::arg&#95;iterator)&gt;</>}>
Callee repair callback type.

The function repair callback is invoked once to rewire the replacement arguments in the body of the new function. The argument replacement info is passed, as build from the registerFunctionSignatureRewrite call, as well as the replacement function and an iteratore to the first replacement argument.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l02229">2229</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>
&#125;

Constructor that takes the argument to be replaced, the types of the replacement arguments, as well as callbacks to repair the call sites and new function after the replacement happened.
